_________________________________________ / We should be careful to get out of an \ | experience only the wisdom that is in | | it - and stay there, lest we be like | | the cat that sits down on a hot | | stove-lid. She will never sit down on a | | hot stove-lid again - and that is well; | | but also she will never sit down on a | | cold one any more. | | | \ -- Mark Twain / ----------------------------------------- \ ^__^ \ (oo)\_______ (__)\ )\/\ ||----w | || ||
